summary: Web game project with focus on mobile-friendly play, including offline testing via PWA/APK wrapping, plus UI layout refinements (smaller sizing and border/gap fixes).
architectural_notes: Consider adding PWA support (web app manifest + service worker) to allow offline caching and easier APK wrapping for Android testing.
known_issues: UI currently has oversized elements and border spacing/gaps that should be removed for a tighter layout.

existing_features.title: Remove the visible gap around the playfield so the outer border sits flush to the available screen area (no padding/margin creating space outside the border), while keeping mobile safe-area insets respected.
Adjust the playfield border/corner styling so borders are cleanly aligned to all four corners with no visual discontinuities or inset gaps at the corners (including the corner accent elements).

Make the in-game UI more compact overall by reducing the on-screen footprint of the HUD (score/level/timer), progress bars, pause button, shoot button, and virtual joystick, while keeping them readable and touchable on mobile.

Ensure gameplay bounds and effective playable area match the updated border/gap behavior so there is no extra 'dead space' between the visible border and the area where the player/obstacles can move (i.e., adjust any playfield padding/bounds calculations accordingly).

new_feature_requests.summary: Make all UI elements smaller/compact and adjust layout so borders touch edges with no gaps after borders
Enable mobile offline testing by making the game PWA-friendly (manifest/service worker/offline caching) so it can be wrapped into an APK via tools like PWABuilder

projectName: Compact UI sizing and remove playfield border gaps
